## Ingredients

## Recipe

* TODO: Need to revisit
* Preheat oven to 375
* Place bacon without overlapping on a wire drying rack over a rimmed baking sheet. Bake for 12-20 min

## Notes

* Note: don't use wire baking rack because difficult to clean without a dishwasher
